warnings: Warnings Do not exceed recommended dosage. This product may cause temporary discomfort such as burning, stinging, sneezing, or an increase in nasal discharge. The use of this container by more than one person may spread infection. Use only as directed. Frequent or prolonged use may cause nasal congestion to recur or worsen. Ill effects may result if taken internally
dosage_administration: Directions adults and children 6 to 12 years of age (with adult supervision): two inhalations in each nostril not more than every two hours. children under 6 years of age: consult a doctor
indications: Uses For the temporarily relief of nasal congestion due to a cold, hay fever, or other upper respiratory allergies (allergic rhinitis).
